body: Fetchlings are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial HD. They have the following racial traits.
name: Fetchling

sections.body: Fetchlings are quick and forceful, but often strange and easily distracted easily by errant thoughts.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Charisma, -2 Wisdom

sections.body: Fetchlings see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Fetchlings can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.
sections.name: Low-Light Vision

sections.body: Fetchlings have a +2 racial bonus on Knowledge (planes) and Stealth checks.
sections.name: Skilled

sections.body: Fetchlings have cold resistance 5 and electricity resistance 5.
sections.name: Shadowy Resistance

sections.body: A fetchling can use disguise self once per day as a spell-like ability. It can assume the form of any humanoid creature using this spell-like ability. When a fetchling reaches 9th level in any combination of classes, it gains shadow walk (self only) as a spell-like ability usable once per day, and at 13th level, it gains plane shift (self only, to the Plane of Shadow or the Material Plane only) usable once per day. A fetchling's caster level is equal to its total Hit Dice.
sections.name: Spell-Like Abilities

sections.body: Fetchlings begin play speaking Common. A fetchling with a high Intelligence score can choose any of the following languages: Aklo, Aquan, Auran, Draconic, D'ziriak (understanding only, cannot speak), Ignan, Terran, and any regional human tongue.
sections.name: Languages
